name: Dark Sea
description:
Tycho Brahe. Scholar, detective and hard hat diver. Consultant for those who need something found or... unearthed. Now he himself has gone missing. The answers to the questions, pardon the pon, swimming around in your head, lie deep beneath the waves. Come and join Tycho on his adventure.

Penny Arcade's "On the Rain-slick precipice of darkness" and associated ip's are property of Penny Arcade Inc/MegaCorp. This is a fan game made with Godot and not an official product.
